title: Training Pest Management Experts: Video-Based Practical Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic agricultural knowledge and understanding of pest management terminology
context.additional_context: Training for corporate internal agricultural technology support teams, focusing on strengthening the ability to apply crop protection techniques in real-world field settings

learning_goals: After watching videos, learners can identify morphological characteristics of major pests (e.g., sugarcane aphids) with 80% accuracy
Learners can measure pest populations within a 15% error margin using density estimation methods presented in videos
Learners will be able to analyze on-site cases and develop pest control plans based on video content within 72 hours after training.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
